post.body: Mildly humorous retort. #lapdogtweet
Keep them away from frat boys and radiators and you should do just fine.
That is maybe the best Avatar ever.
"Reading Twitter." Is that what you call it?
@squibble Most days I'm like, "Okay, what's that word? It's like, you know, but starts with M... or maybe R..."
I favrd you because the rim shot on that one was one of my better auditory hallucinations.
I nominate @bcompton for a Shorty Award in #humor because... the man is a skilled humorist. For reals.
I nominate @fakesarahpalin for a Shorty Award in #humor because... I don't think I have ever laughed so hard over politica ...
YES! Definitely.
no, no-- that's a Starbucks.
smart!
Why did you make me watch that?
He is so lithe for a fat man!
HOnestly... it's brilliant. I love when my kids turn purple.
I realized too late that I should have RT'd ya! Next time I'll be sure to give you credit. :^)
omg... zombie Jesus! HE HAS A NAME!!!
You got crop-dusted.
ohholymotherofgawd that man is hot.
This made me happy.
Yyyeaahhh about thaaaat.... I need you to come in on Saturday to do the TPS reports...
Happy birthday.
And yes, I have trouble walking across the Golden Gate, as well.
DJ sent the song list for the wedding. I'm compelled to pick the worst, lamest songs I know... just...cuz...they're all listed RIGHT THERE.
Hey, Blagojevich, wig much?
Dear Well-meaning Christians: Please stop.
Invitations be damned. I'm not sure how it will happen yet, but by GAWD, I WILL have the humping unicorns on the wedding cake.
Hey Geeks of twitter (and you know who I'm talking to): My 12 y.o. wants stop animation software for xmas. Windows platform. Suggestions?
Saw "Milk" this weekend. Cried.
http://twitpic.com/sjq2 - Best ever.
Whaaaaat is it callllllled when a perrrrrsonn tallllks like thissss? Besides fucking annoying as shit, I mean? PATRONIZING! exfuckingzactly.
I love you, I love you, I love you iTunes, and I would marry you but I'm so Elizabeth Taylor already. "May the road rise with yoooouuuuu..."
Just remembered my brother asked me to make dessert tomorrow night. For 23 people. I so want to show up with Thunderbird & a box of Ho-Hos.
I hear squealing, pummeling and a child's voice shouting, "Kill him!" Aahhhh, the sounds of Christmas.
The 5yo then accuses me of having picked everything out wrong when I made her, like I created her at Build a Bear or something.
5yo:"Mom, next time you makeded me, I want brown hair and brown eyes and I want my name to be Alexa Sparkle Barbie Princess Diamond Castle."
A whole bucket full of awesome: http://tinyurl.com/7qgxsj
It's the first time I've ever received the visage of a tortured, beaten man on the solstice. He wants us to keep it in our bedroom... yay.
I spent Yule at conservative, Catholic relative's pad. He gave us a crucifix. Nothing screams "appropriate gift" like a bloody, impaled guy.
Filling out Xmas cards. I am compelled to start with, "Dear Lamewad." It just feels so right.
Awesome night of playing Twister with the kids. Rumpus-sniffing dog is the secret to victory.
